data.text: @kassshhhh__ Hi there! Our site is up and running as it should be. If you are experiencing issues on your end, please feel welcome to send us a DM: https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC so that a member of our team can troubleshoot with you. - C

Today is one of our favorites - it's #GirlsInAviationDay! To celebrate, we teamed up with the Las Vegas chapter of @WomenInAviation to welcome some very special visitors to @LASairport for a behind-the-scenes tour with aviation professionals from across the industry! #GIAD21 https://t.co/kdfhmzpHvA

data.text: @jess4raven Hi Jessica! The youngest a passenger can be while traveling unaccompanied on Allegiant is 15 years of age. https://t.co/qDol6DJ4va If you'd like to purchase additional seats, you can do so by calling in out our Customer Care Service Center at (702) 505-8888. - C

@pushytherapist Hi Lori! We'd be happy to look into this. Please tell us your flight number. - GM

@GodandCulture Hi Paul! We're so sorry for any frustrations. We recommend to delete the tweet with your boarding pass information for security purposes. Please send us a DM so we can help you. - GM https://t.co/ehIvBukkje

Our Dispatchers are expert multitaskers who are always committed to getting the job done. Over the course of a single day, each Dispatcher handles up to 40 flights. They create flight plans, coordinate across teams and ensure each flight is a success! #TogetherWeFly https://t.co/WNPHZjbyFl

@hopeannhintz We typically publish our calendar 4-6 months in advance, and currently have flights available until May of 22. It looks like the route will be on a service break. I’m sorry for any inconvenience this may cause! - GM
@David37432268 Can't wait to have you onboard to take you to your big day! 🧡💛💙 - GM

urls.title: Customer Request For Assistance | Allegiant Air
urls.description: Do you have specific travel issues? We’re here to help! Use the online form to send us a customer assistance request.

data.text: @BlakeB_72 Hi Blake! We’re so sorry to hear about this! If you were unable to report checked baggage issues at the airport, please email us about your missing baggage here: https://t.co/fP8K46I26K so that the appropriate department can begin working your claim. - C
@CuntryGurlSwagg Hi Marie! Thanks for reaching out. We do not offer price adjustments, in accordance with our terms and conditions. Learn more here: https://t.co/2tbIkJ2Ob1 - C

@RallyMD Hi Chris! Thanks for reaching out. If you have an existing reservation with us, please send us a DM: https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC with your reservation information and the specific details of your inquiry, so that we can look into it for you. - C

@stairsmaster76 Hi Michael! Thanks for reaching out. If you are in need of assistance, please send us a DM: https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC with your voucher information and the specific details of your request. - C

@acervantes2000 Hi there! We're sorry to hear your flight was canceled. If you need assistance, please feel welcome to send us a DM: https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC with your reservation information and the specific details of your request. - C

data.text: @RNLindseyBrynne Hi Lindsey! If you still need assistance, please send us a DM with your details and we will be happy to review. - GM https://t.co/ehIvBukkje

@GreatScottFord Hi Scott! If you'd like to redeem your voucher, you can do so by booking on our website or on the mobile app. If you don't have the voucher number, please send us a DM with your details and we will be happy to locate it for you. - GM https://t.co/ehIvBukkje
@BrennenYaquinto Hi Brennen! We are so sorry to hear this. Please send us a DM with your details. - GM https://t.co/ehIvBukkje
@ohhh_karla Hi Karla! We'd be happy to review. Please send us a DM with your details. - GM https://t.co/ehIvBukkje

@jordanstellini However, our team members are still expected to ensure that no debris is left from the previous passengers. We thank you for sharing your experience with us, as we are constantly evaluating our policies and procedures and adjusting them when necessary. - GM

@jordanstellini We regret that the upkeep of the aircraft used for this flight did not meet your expectations, and apologize for any discomfort this may have caused. Each aircraft is cleaned on a daily basis, but we do not have an opportunity to disinfect the aircraft in between each flight.
@Donjo1983 Hi Don! We're so sorry for any frustrations. If you need assistance, please send us a DM with your details for review. - GM https://t.co/ehIvBukkje
@ChanlerRaper Hi Chanler! We're so sorry for any frustrations. If you need assistance, please send us a DM for review. - GM https://t.co/ehIvBukkje
@BuzzlesMr Hi there! In order to receive free bags, you would just need to present your military I.D to the agent at the gate and/or ticket counter. :) - GM
@johnnymknox Hi Johnny! Please send us a DM with your voucher number and email on file for review. We'd be happy to look into your request. - GM https://t.co/ehIvBukkje
@thinkerstjames Happy to hear it! Hope to see you onboard again real soon! :) - GM

@jessiL0 Hi Jessi, We're so sorry for the delay. We've been able to locate your message in the queue, while it may take some time as we work through such a high volume of requests, we're looking forward to helping you. -TM

@deva_station3 We're so sorry to hear about the troubles you've been having getting through. We're currently making our way through a large volume of requests, which has impacted our response times. Please DM us your confirmation number and email, so we can assist you with this!-TM

Check out this article from the experts at The Points Guy about our new Allways Rewards program! 

https://t.co/3yhTX1RZuQ

Forget restrictions, blackout dates and mileage tracking - with Allways Rewards you can continuously earn and redeem points for travel and unlock unique member rewards from our Allegiant partners including sports and concert tickets and exclusive experiences! #AllwaysOnTheGo https://t.co/i3ZpheuDHT

data.text: Today, we proudly introduce Allways Rewards, the very first airline loyalty program designed specifically for leisure travelers! https://t.co/PDadN2OeHm

Our all-nonstop network just keeps on growing! Today, we are introducing 2️⃣2️⃣ brand new routes!

Get ready. Get set. GO NONSTOP at https://t.co/Z48IktK9Yu. https://t.co/bXYtc89ot4
Three cheers for the weekend! 🎉🎉🎉 https://t.co/z7zW7knAvD

It's official! Construction will resume on our destination resort, Sunseeker Resort Charlotte Harbor, this month!

In addition to bringing 800 construction jobs to the area, Sunseeker will ultimately employ 1,150 people, making it the third largest employer in Southwest Florida. https://t.co/Lb772hLYvc
💙🧡💛 https://t.co/66zwdXX7UZ
✅ Now the real question - which music venue is at the top of your concert bucket list?

LOVE LIVE MUSIC? We're partnering with Live Nation venues, Ticketmaster and the biggest music festivals to bring together the best of travel and live entertainment. Get unprecedented access and enjoy once-in-a-lifetime live music experiences! 

Learn more: https://t.co/RNe0bJrAPj https://t.co/zC0kXz5bqD
